snippet: The vegetable, which began as an agricultural fluke, has grown to become a powerful example of what happens when marketing hype, politics and produce converge.
abstract: Vidalia onion, first planted to help stave off the effects of the great Depression, has grown to become a powerful example of what happens when marketing hype, politics and produce converge; growers of Vidalias, crop which brings in about $150 million a year, are pressing for changes in laws restricting when onions can be shipped each season.
lead_paragraph: The vegetable, which began as an agricultural fluke, has grown to become a powerful example of what happens when marketing hype, politics and produce converge.

headline.main: Vidalia Onions: A Crop With an Image to Uphold
headline.print_headline: An Onion’s Image Is at Stake
